recipesJson.name: Thugger Juice
recipesJson.author: tranceinate
recipesJson.description: Thug Juice made better. It's a pretty self-explanatory recipe. Can sub Menthol with .25% INW Eucalyptus with Mint

reviews.text: Really enjoying this. Initial testers were one with eucalyptus mint and one without. I prefer without the mint, but I could see myself vaping it if I had a sore throat.
Love this so much. It scratches my summertime itch. Better than Grack Juice IMO.
This is delicious. I altered it a little by upping the watermelon to 5% and adding 0.25% Super Sweet to my tastes, but all in all this is wayyyyy better than Thug Juice.
This is really good alternative to jungle juice by FW (AKA thug juice). It has a stronger grape flavour, and unlike jungle juice isn't drowned out by the menthol. Delicious.
